conversations.content:
Hi, I want to try two restaurants in Paris today. For lunch, please recommend some restaurants that serves French cuisine, find the one with the highest rating.
For dinner, I want to try a restaurant which serves Chinese cuisine, and find the one with the highest rating.
Tell me how much it costs to eat at each restaurant.

<function_thought>
To fulfill the user's request, the first step is to get all restaurants in Paris. This will provide a comprehensive list from which I can filter the French and Chinese cuisine options for lunch and dinner, respectively. After obtaining this list, I can determine the cuisine types and evaluate ratings to find the highest-rated options. Finally, I will check the prices for both selected restaurants.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_all_restaurants_in_city(city="Paris")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

Restaurant in Paris: New Israeli Restaurant
Breizh Café
New Asiaway
Le Baratin
Bistrot Paul Bert
Royal Panda
The yard
China Garden
Miznon
Chez L'Ami Jean

<function_thought>
I have obtained a list of restaurants in Paris. Now, I will proceed to check the cuisine types for the restaurants to identify those that serve French and Chinese cuisine.
</function_thought>

<final_answer></final_answer>

{'New Israeli Restaurant': 'Israeli', 'Breizh Café': 'French', 'New Asiaway': 'Chinese', 'Le Baratin': 'French', 'Bistrot Paul Bert': 'French', 'Royal Panda': 'Chinese', 'The yard': 'Chinese', 'China Garden': 'Chinese', 'Miznon': 'Israeli', "Chez L'Ami Jean": 'French'}

<function_thought>

</function_thought>
